musics.title: Dumb Dumb
musics.description: The song introduces the cute red side of the group with a “brassy” and “genre-mashing” dance-pop track with R&B, funk and hip-hop elements. like in the MV, the song explains the symptoms of having a crush and compares it to being played like a doll.

musics.title: Howlin’ 404
musics.description: The title of the song contains several meanings. ‘Howlin’’ represents a wolf, loneliness, and blusterous tornado while ‘404’ stand for error and robotic model name. It depicts a bad trip and an unescapable loop of desperate struggles to escape systems of modern industrial society. The dark, dystopian mood of the song with slight taste of oriental instruments suggests a drastic change in DEAN’s genre – alternative.

musics.title: instagram
musics.description:
The song sound features a slow melancholic guitar melody with slow beats throughout.

Instagram is about the social media platform, as the title tells us, but has a deeper meaning, about sometimes feeling alone, depressed, and insecure within today’s digital age.

musics.title: STAY
musics.description:
“STAY” is the second track from their second single album titled “Square Two”, released on November 1, 2016 by YG Entertainment and distributed by KT Music.

On October 19, 2016, it was revealed that Black Pink would be the next YG artist to make a comeback.
Teaser images of all four members were released on October 27 for the second title track “Stay”. On October 30, YG released the behind-the-scenes video.

musics.title: Euphoria
musics.description: BTS (방탄소년단) Euphoria is story connected to HYYH (The most beautiful moments in life/HwaYangYeonHwa) and YNWA (You Never Walk alone) it can also be connected to Love Yourself: Highlight reels and Wings. Its theorized all the music and music videos are connected to one overall stories relating to bts past self or alternate selves
